Title: Tom and Jerry: Snowman's Land
Writer: Will Finn, Jase Ricci, Joseph Barbera
Actors: Carlos Alazraqui, Kimberly Brooks, Joey D'Auria
Plot: With magic in the air, Jerry and his nephew, Tuffy, make a snow mouse that miraculously comes to life. To keep their new friend, Larry the snow mouse from melting, Tuffy and Jerry must race him to the fabled Snowman's Village.
